column1: U.S. CITIZEN AIR TRAFFIC2 TO OVERSEAS REGIONS, CANADA & MEXICO
1 Final data includes 'late records' not reflected in monthly reports
2 Air traffic only, non-stop from US port to foreign port. Not same as total 'visitation' throughout the respective regions (refer 2007 U.S. Outbound Profile)
3 Percentage change is compared to the same time frame from 2006.
Note:  Air traffic to Overseas and Mexico (on U.S. and foreign flags) is based on the Office of Travel and Tourism Industries (OTTI) "U.S. International Air Travel Statistics Report" I-92.
Air traffic to Canada data is obtained from Statistics Canada.
To find out more about the I-92 program, visit:
Source:  U.S. Department of Commerce, International Trade Administration, Office of Travel and Tourism Industries.
